Syncthing: open source bittorrentSync

ãƒã‚¤ãƒŠãƒªãƒ¼ãŒã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã‚ˆã‚Šãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹äº‹ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ãŒã€brewã‚ˆã‚Šä¸€ç™ºã§ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚

å¸¸æ™‚ç¨¼åƒã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼orç«¯æœ«ãŒå¿…è¦ãªã®ã§ã€Synologyã®NASã‚’ä½¿ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ç°¡å˜ã«ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚è©³ç´°ã¯[ã“ã¡ã‚‰]()

$ brew install syncthing
==> Downloading https://homebrew.bintray.com/bottles/syncthing-0.10.30.mavericks
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Pouring syncthing-0.10.30.mavericks.bottle.tar.gz
==> Caveats
To have launchd start syncthing at login:
    ln -sfv /usr/local/opt/syncthing/*.plist ~/Library/LaunchAgents
Then to load syncthing now:
    launchctl load ~/Library/LaunchAgents/homebrew.mxcl.syncthing.plist
==> Summary

    override func viewDidAppear(animated: Bool) {
        super.viewDidAppear(animated)
        self.becomeFirstResponder()
    }
    
    override func canBecomeFirstResponder() -> Bool {
        return true
    }
    
    override func motionEnded(motion: UIEventSubtype, withEvent event: UIEvent!) {
        if(event.subtype == UIEventSubtype.MotionShake) {
            //

            //
        }
    }

ã»ã¼å…¨ã¦ã®æ‹™ä½œã®ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒªã§ã¯ã€ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒ–ãƒ«ã‚»ãƒ«ã§ã®ãƒãƒ¼ã®è‰²å¤‰æ›´ã‚¿ãƒƒãƒ—ã¨ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯æ™‚é–“å·®ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦è¡Œã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

[NSObject cancelPreviousPerformRequestsWithTarget:self
                                         selector:@selector(notifiyUpdate)
                                           object:nil];

           withObject:nil
           afterDelay:kUpdateCellShortInterval];

object-cã§ä¸Šè¨˜ã«æ›¸ã‹ã‚ŒãŸperformSelectorã¯Swiftã§ã¯ç„¡ããªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ãŸã‚ˆã†ãªã®ã§ã€ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã¯å‹•ã‹ãªã„ã€‚

å¹¾ã¤ã‹ã®æ–¹æ³•ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ãŒã€ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸæ–¹æ³•ãŒç°¡æ˜“ã§ã‚ˆã„ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€cancelPreviousPerformRequestsWithTargetãŒç„¡ç”¨ã«ãªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã†ã€‚å‡¦ç†ã®äº‹å‰ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ³ã‚»ãƒ«ã‚‚å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€å°‘ã—ä¿®æ­£ã—ã¦æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚

private var tapTimer: NSTimer?

// å‡¦ç†
cancelTimer()
tapTimer = NSTimer.scheduledTimerWithTimeInterval(Interval.UpdateCell, target: self, selector:  notify, userInfo: nil, repeats: false)
//

func cancelTimer() {
    if tappingTimer != nil {
        tappingTimer!.invalidate()
    }
}
